text.div: This value set includes all the "Anatomical Structure" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 91723000: Anatomical structure)"

description.value: This value set includes all the "Anatomical Structure" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 91723000: Anatomical structure)
